flawed_nl_solution:
The second ticket sold will cost $1 + $1 = $<<1+1=7>>7.
The third ticket sold will cost $7 + $1 = $<<7+1=8>>8.
The fourth ticket sold will cost $8 + $1 = $<<8+1=9>>9.
The fifth ticket sold will cost $9 + $1 = $<<9+1=10>>10.
The total money collected is $1 + $7 + $8 + $9 + $10 = $<<1+7+8+9+10=35>>35.
After taking profit, the total prize money will be $35 - $4 = $<<35-4=31>>31.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
